comment.body: sorry to ask you here, If the ISP block all the trackers IP, is there a change for other users to find my web site in my country?
@ssdifnskdjfnsdjk@zeroid.bit: so do you know any condition to be a tracker? or any document to setup a tracker. I want to setup one here

thanks guys, I am trying to setup one ZeroMe for my country, but when i cloned the site, it is lacking of the hubs, so i cannot start. Cause if i dont have a hub, connect to current green or sun hub, it will load all data as the default ZermoMe :D
@ssdifnskdjfnsdjk@zeroid.bit: what I did is: 1. I created a new site, 2. I download the code of zerome site from github. 3. i copy the code into the folder of the new site

@ssdifnskdjfnsdjk@zeroid.bit: If i dont copy the dbchema.json file and rebuild it, then it is my site, but if i copy the dbchemma.json and rebuild it, it will load the site as mine, but data as this zerome
